weather.precipitation: Generally low rainfall with occasional showers
weather.what_to_pack: Light clothing, sunscreen, hat, sunglasses, and a light jacket for cooler evenings

tourism.crowds: High tourist density, especially in popular tourist spots
tourism.costs: Prices tend to be higher compared to shoulder seasons but lower than peak winter season
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations and attractions in advance to secure availability

highlights.name: Salzburg Festival
highlights.description: Iconic music and drama festival featuring world-class performances
highlights.tips: Purchase tickets well in advance, explore fringe events for unique experiences

highlights.name: Sound of Music Tour
highlights.description: Guided tour showcasing locations from the famous movie
highlights.tips: Book early due to high demand, prepare for some crowds

highlights.name: Hohensalzburg Fortress Concerts
highlights.description: Concerts held in the historic fortress with stunning views
highlights.tips: Arrive early for a good spot, check the schedule for performances

highlights.name: Lakes and Mountains Exploration
highlights.description: Visit nearby lakes and mountains for outdoor activities and breathtaking scenery
highlights.tips: Pack hiking gear, swimwear, and plan for picnics

highlights.name: Summer Night Concerts
highlights.description: Open-air concert at Mirabell Palace Gardens
highlights.tips: Arrive early to grab a good spot, enjoy the beautiful setting

highlights.name: Salzburg Street Food Festival
highlights.description: Celebration of local and international street food delicacies
highlights.tips: Try a variety of dishes, expect lively crowds

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy the warm weather and scenic routes
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Rent a bike, wear a helmet, carry water

recommended_activities.activity: Visit to Hellbrunn Palace and Trick Fountains
recommended_activities.why_this_season: Best experienced in the sunny weather
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Join a guided tour, prepare to get wet at the fountains

recommended_activities.activity: Day trip to Berchtesgaden National Park
recommended_activities.why_this_season: Ideal for hiking and exploring the alpine landscapes
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Wear sturdy shoes, bring a camera, check park regulations

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Experience classical music in a historic setting
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Reserve tickets in advance, dress smartly

recommended_activities.activity: Explore Salzburg Old Town on a walking tour
recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy the pleasant weather while discovering historic sites
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Wear comfortable shoes, carry a map or guidebook

recommended_activities.activity: Day trip to the Salzkammergut Lake District
recommended_activities.why_this_season: Scenic beauty and water activities in the summer
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Pack swimwear, sunscreen, plan for boat rides

recommended_activities.activity: Visit to Mozart’s Birthplace and Residence
recommended_activities.why_this_season: Learn about the life of Mozart in the city he was born
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Audio guides available, expect some queues

recommended_activities.activity: Enjoy open-air dining at local beer gardens
recommended_activities.why_this_season: Relax in the warm evenings with local cuisine and drinks
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Try local specialties, be mindful of closing times

recommended_activities.activity: Take a boat tour on the Salzach River
recommended_activities.why_this_season: See the city from a different perspective
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check tour timings, bring a camera

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Beautifully landscaped gardens in full bloom
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Visit early morning or late evening for fewer crowds

not_recommended: Outdoor activities without proper sun protection
Crowded tourist spots during peak hours
Unplanned visits to popular attractions without pre-booking
